home.description: As I approach the completion of my Computer Science degree at the University of Montreal, I'm on the lookout for a Software Engineering internship where I can further build my stack and dive into real-world projects.

about.description: As Arthur C. Clarke once said, 'Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.' This perspective shapes my approach as I near the completion of my B.Sc. in Computer Science from the University of Montr√©al. After a rich experience as a QA Team Lead at LXT AI, I am now seeking new horizons to grow, learn, and push on that vision of mine.

workExperience.position: Deputy Internal VP + Graduating Students Representative
workExperience.details: Engaged in student association as a representative and committee member.
workExperience.resumeDetails: Engaged in my student association as the representative for graduating students and as a member of the Representation Committee, contributing to the advocacy and support of student interests and needs.

workExperience.position: Quality Team Lead: GCP Subprocessor Speech-To-Text
workExperience.details: Managed quality standards for big data projects, focusing on workflow optimization.
workExperience.resumeDetails: Oversaw a team of 20, upholding high-quality standards in big data processing, closely aligned with client objectives. Led initiatives to enhance workflows and data processing pipelines, resulting in improved efficiency and accuracy. Developed and implemented tools and trainings that reduced error rates by 20% and increased overall team productivity.

workExperience.details: Oversaw retail operations, emphasizing technology expertise and customer satisfaction.
workExperience.resumeDetails: Driven by a fervent interest in hardware and cutting-edge technologies, leveraged product knowledge and interpersonal skills to deliver exemplary customer experience while aligning with management expectations.

projects.name: Classification of Extreme Weather Events (Kaggle)
projects.description: Engaged in a Kaggle competition aimed at the detection and classification of extreme weather events using climate data. Developed models using logistic regression, SVM linear, and XGBoost.

projects.name: ASCII Sign Language Classification (Kaggle)
projects.description: Participated in a Kaggle competition to classify sign language images. Implemented Random Forest and CNN models, utilizing XGBoost for enhanced performance.

projects.name: FishHunt (JavaFX Game)
projects.description: Developed a JavaFX-based game simulating a shark catching fish. Implemented dynamic fish movement, level progression, and a high-score system.

projects.name: Yu-Gi-Oh Inventory CSV Manager
projects.description: Created a script for managing a Yu-Gi-Oh card collection, integrating TCGPlayer API for detailed card information.
